quotes.quote: Fear of failure is what fuels me, keeps me on edge and sharp. I'm not as good when I'm comfortable.
Now I see that I will never find the light unless, like the candle, I am my own fuel, consuming myself.
Are you gonna fuel your faith or fuel your fear? I'm all about fueling my faith, especially when it's hard to do so.
Passion towards a dream is the fuel that fires every trace of impossibility in the environment, paving way for you to win with style.
While spirituality provides an efficient and endless fuel for your mind and body, you must burn that fuel with human action towards your goals, dreams, and desires.
Determination is the fuel that propels one to higher virtues.
Empathy fuels connection; sympathy drives disconnection.
Their doubt is your fuel for dreams. You just have to drive.
The fuel of ambition is not the problem; it is the focus of ambition that frees or betrays us.
Hope fuels your inspirations while doubts assault your aspirations!
I am building a fire, and everyday I train, I add more fuel. At just the right moment, I light the match.
The only thing that counts is your dedication to the game. You run on your own fuel; it comes from within you.
Fuel your kids' dreams. Sometimes, that means letting them stay up past their bedtimes.
If you fuel your journey on the opinions of others, you are going to run out of gas.
Her anger was the fuel she used to keep going.
Encouragement is the fuel on which hope runs.
Stand back! I gotta get some rocket fuel out of the fridge!
TEAMWORK: the fuel that allows common people attain uncommon results.
Giving is what fuels us. Giving is our future.
Throughout my career, I fed off the fuel of people not being able to understand me.
People acting in their own self-interest is the fuel for all the discovery, innovation, and prosperity that powers the world.
I think loss can fuel how you lead your whole life.
Suffering is the fuel in the engine of civilization.
If you continue to work hard, let that be the fuel to your fire.
Hope is fuel for living; without it, we'll stop here.
Contentment consists not in adding more fuel, but in taking away some fire.
My fuel for my fire is to be able to provide for my family.
Reading has been the fuel of my motivation: it has changed the direction in which I have traveled, and it has enhanced my creative imagination more than any other activity I have ever pursued.
